scripts.test:unit: npm run build && npm run test:unit --workspaces --if-present
scripts.test:e2e:wait4peers: npm run ipfs:wait4peers && npm run test:e2e
scripts.ipfs:wait4peers: n_peers=0; while [ $n_peers -lt 2 ]; do n_peers=$(docker exec nice-agent-alice-ipfs ipfs swarm peers | uniq | wc -l); sleep 1; done
scripts.dev:peer: npm run build --workspace=frontend && dotenv -e .env.nice-agent-issuer.dev -- npx --workspace=backend-peer prisma migrate deploy && npm run --workspace=backend-peer dev
scripts.dev:issuer: export DOTENV_FILE_PATHS="$(pwd)/.env.nice-agent-issuer.dev $(pwd)/.env.nice-agent-issuer.local" && npm run build --workspace=frontend && dotenv -e .env.nice-agent-issuer.dev -- npx --workspace=backend-issuer prisma migrate deploy && npm run --workspace=backend-issuer dev
scripts.compose:up: npm run compose:up:agent:alice && npm run compose:up:agent:bob && npm run compose:up:agent:issuer
scripts.compose:down: for ROLE in alice bob issuer; do docker compose -p nice-agent-${ROLE} down; done
scripts.compose:down:clean: for ROLE in alice bob issuer; do docker compose -p nice-agent-${ROLE} down -v; done
scripts.compose:up:test: npm run compose:down:clean:test && npm run compose:up:agent:test:alice && npm run compose:up:agent:test:bob && npm run compose:up:agent:test:issuer
scripts.compose:up:agent:test:alice: export COMPOSE_EXTRA_OPTS="${COMPOSE_EXTRA_OPTS} -f docker-compose.test.override.yml" && npm run compose:up:agent:alice
scripts.compose:up:agent:test:bob: export COMPOSE_EXTRA_OPTS="${COMPOSE_EXTRA_OPTS} -f docker-compose.test.override.yml" && npm run compose:up:agent:bob
scripts.compose:up:agent:test:issuer: export COMPOSE_EXTRA_OPTS="${COMPOSE_EXTRA_OPTS} -f docker-compose.test.override.yml" && npm run compose:up:agent:issuer
scripts.compose:up:deps:dev: npm run compose:up:dep:dev:alice && npm run compose:up:dep:dev:bob && npm run compose:up:dep:dev:issuer
scripts.compose:up:deps:dev:alice: export SERVICES="veritable postgres" COMPOSE_EXTRA_OPTS="${COMPOSE_EXTRA_OPTS} --env-file .env.nice-agent-alice.dev" && npm run compose:up:agent:alice
scripts.compose:up:deps:dev:bob: export SERVICES="veritable postgres" COMPOSE_EXTRA_OPTS="${COMPOSE_EXTRA_OPTS} --env-file .env.nice-agent-bob.dev" && npm run compose:up:agent:bob
scripts.compose:up:deps:dev:issuer: export SERVICES="veritable postgres" COMPOSE_EXTRA_OPTS="${COMPOSE_EXTRA_OPTS} --env-file .env.nice-agent-issuer.dev" && npm run compose:up:agent:issuer
scripts.compose:up:deps:test: npm run compose:up:deps:test:alice && npm run compose:up:deps:test:bob && npm run compose:up:deps:test:issuer
scripts.compose:up:deps:test:alice: export SERVICES="veritable postgres" && npm run compose:up:agent:test:alice
scripts.compose:up:deps:test:bob: export SERVICES="veritable postgres" && npm run compose:up:agent:test:bob
scripts.compose:up:deps:test:issuer: export SERVICES="veritable postgres" && npm run compose:up:agent:test:issuer
scripts.compose:down:clean:test: for ROLE in alice bob issuer; do docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.override.yml -p nice-agent-${ROLE} down -v; done
scripts.compose:down:clean:all: npm run compose:down:clean && npm run compose:down:clean:test
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:build:peer && npm run docker:build:issuer
